title: JAK ggplot theme — jak_theme
code: jak_theme(   base_size = 10,   plot_title_size = 12,   axis_title_size = 11,   base_color = "gray30",   plot_title_color = "gray30",   axis_title_color = "gray30",   bg_color = "transparent",   grid_color = "gray80",   border_width = 0.5,   strip_size = 10,   strip_color = "transparent",   strip_line = 0,   legend_size = 10,   legend_position = "bottom",   base_family = "" )

title: JAK ggplot theme — jak_theme
text: base_size Font size things plot_title_size Font size plot titles axis_title_size Font size axis titles base_color Color text lines plot_title_color Color plot titles axis_title_color Color axis titles bg_color background color grid_color Color grid lines strip_size Font size facet strip titles strip_color Color facet strip titles strip_line Line width facet strip titles legend_size Font size legend legend_position Position legend base_family Font family

what: A full-service color palette creator — palette_jak
title: A full-service color palette creator — palette_jak
text: function creates vector RGB values suitable ggplot similar. using p argument use one default palettes jak_palettes data object, can pass colors using colors argument. makes function useful extend interpolate values given palette can return n colors. final parameter whether want reverse values .

title: A full-service color palette creator — palette_jak
A full-service color palette creator — palette_jak
text: p named color palette colors optional vector rgb colors use. Overwrites p n Number colors return order default, reverse random order

title: A full-service color palette creator — palette_jak
text: Internally, color palette "ramped" using colorRampPalette(). , colors passed via colors argument first checked whether valid using all_are_valid_colors() function.
